    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void creatNewRoom​(java.lang.String oneStepID, java.lang.String messageBody)
      Used to create a new room in rooms and send the room number message.
      private void entryRoom​(java.lang.String messageBody, java.lang.String oneStepID)
      Entry room function, used to change player2 to waiting in the specified room in rooms (player1 has already entered the room by default when creating the room).
      private void exitGame​(java.lang.String messageBody)
      Exit the game function, used to delete the specified room.
      private java.lang.String getCardsMessage()
      The random card data generation function, used to generate random and non-repetitive card numbers and randomly select two different answers, and return card data.
      private java.lang.String getRandomID​(java.lang.String head)
      Random ID function, used to obtain random IDs.
      void GettingMessageSQS()
      Polling message function, used to create a connection client to Input SQS and poll messages from that SQS, processing messages based on headers.
      private void inGame​(java.lang.String messageBody)
      In game function, used to record the number of steps taken by the user during a turn and end the turn when both users have completed the game.
      private void messageSent1​(java.lang.String massage, java.lang.String GroupHead, java.lang.String DPHead)
      The message sending function, used to create a connection client with Output1 SQS and send messages.
      private void messageSent2​(java.lang.String massage, java.lang.String GroupHead, java.lang.String DPHead)
      The message sending function, used to create a connection client with Output2 SQS and send messages.
      private void roundOver​(java.lang.String roomID, java.lang.String[] room)
      The end of turn function, used to return the steps of both players and clear the card set.
      private void startGame​(java.lang.String messageBody)
      Start game function, used to change the player status of both parties in the specified room to Playing and return the card data of that room.

        GroupHead - The message's group id head

        GroupHead - The message's group id head
        DPHead - The message's deduplication id head

      • getCardsMessage

        private java.lang.String getCardsMessage()
        The random card data generation function, used to generate random and non-repetitive card numbers and randomly select two different answers, and return card data.
        Returns:
        card data in the format of "answer1 # answer2 # cardData"

      • getRandomID

        private java.lang.String getRandomID​(java.lang.String head)
        Random ID function, used to obtain random IDs.
        Parameters:
        head - message's group id head
        Returns:
        head+id(6 digits)

      • GettingMessageSQS

        public void GettingMessageSQS()
        Polling message function, used to create a connection client to Input SQS and poll messages from that SQS, processing messages based on headers.

      • exitGame

        private void exitGame​(java.lang.String messageBody)
        Exit the game function, used to delete the specified room.
        Parameters:
        messageBody - The message's content

      • inGame

        private void inGame​(java.lang.String messageBody)
        In game function, used to record the number of steps taken by the user during a turn and end the turn when both users have completed the game.
        Parameters:
        messageBody - The input message's content

      • roundOver

        private void roundOver​(java.lang.String roomID,
                       java.lang.String[] room)
        The end of turn function, used to return the steps of both players and clear the card set. If the end of 5 rounds, clear the room
        Parameters:
        roomID - The input room id
        room - The room

      • startGame

        private void startGame​(java.lang.String messageBody)
        Start game function, used to change the player status of both parties in the specified room to Playing and return the card data of that room. If there is no card data yet, the getCardsMessage () function is called to generate card data and store and return it.
        Parameters:
        messageBody - The input message's content

      • entryRoom

        private void entryRoom​(java.lang.String messageBody,
                       java.lang.String oneStepID)
        Entry room function, used to change player2 to waiting in the specified room in rooms (player1 has already entered the room by default when creating the room).
        Parameters:
        messageBody - The input message's content
        oneStepID - The message One-Step-ID, used for client check the message return to whom.

      • creatNewRoom

        private void creatNewRoom​(java.lang.String oneStepID,
                          java.lang.String messageBody)
        Used to create a new room in rooms and send the room number message.
        Parameters:
        oneStepID - The message One-Step-ID, used for client check the message return to whom.
